description: A mid-version of the Hueco: The Hueco Advanced Low LTH Women is a high-quality everyday shoe with a comfortable fit, modern design and specially selected smooth leather. The high-grip Michelin sole offers optimum control on both rocks and asphalt. The Strobel construction provides cushioning, the TPU heel support and rubber caps ensure reliable protection. The Hueco Advanced Mid LTH Men for everyday wear and approaches.
name: Mammut Hueco Advanced Mid - Mens
